name: Performance Fluids Performance Cooler Prover Oil
description: Performance Fluids Performance Cooler Prover Oil is a fully synthetic NSF H1 registered (no. 137770) food grade oil designed for the lubrication of chains in bakery provers and coolers. It is approved by Spooner Industries for their Provers and Coolers as it contains unique additives to prevent acidic corrosion. The product has excellent water resistance and tackiness additives to ensure the product clings to the bearing surfaces whilst still being able to penetrate the pins and internal bushes.
